org.apache.james.protocols.netty

Class AbstractAsyncServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.protocols.netty.AbstractAsyncServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolServer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyServer

    public abstract class AbstractAsyncServer
extends Object
implements ProtocolServer
    Abstract base class for Servers which want to use async io

      • createBossExecutor

        protected Executor createBossExecutor()
        Create a new Executor used for dispatch messages to the workers. One Thread will be used per port which is bound. This can get overridden if needed, by default it use a Executors.newCachedThreadPool()
        Returns:
        bossExecutor

      • createWorkerExecutor

        protected Executor createWorkerExecutor()
        Create a new Executor used for workers. This can get overridden if needed, by default it use a Executors.newCachedThreadPool()
        Returns:
        workerExecutor
